Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
litesql::AndConnects two expressions with and-operator
litesql::BackendAn abstract base class for interfacing with relational databases
litesql::Backend::CursorAn abstract base class for cursors that iterate result sets returned by relational database
litesql::ConnectiveUsed to connect two expressions
litesql::Cursor< T >Used to iterate results of SQL statement, creates objects of type T from retrieved records
litesql::DatabaseA base class of databases
litesql::Database::SchemaItemIntermediate representation of single entity in relational database, table, index or sequence
litesql::DatabaseErrorException thrown when database cannot be accessed
litesql::DataSource< T >Template class which holds SelectQuery for selecting objects of type T
litesql::DateHolds date
litesql::DateTimeHolds date and time of day

litesql::ExceptBase class for exceptions

litesql::GtEqGreater or equal operator

litesql::LikeLike operator
litesql::LtLess than operator

litesql::NotEqInequality operator

litesql::OrConnects two expression with or-operator

litesql::RawExprUsed to inject custom expression into WHERE-clause

litesql::SelectQueryClass that helps creating SELECT-SQL statements
litesql::SplitSplits and joins strings

litesql::TimeHolds time of day
litesql::UnknownErrorException thrown when none of other exceptions match
